title: In Huck's Shoes
subtle: Adventure (fiction), 2,355 words, Level Y (Grade 5), Lexile 720L, Fiction Series
description: In Huck's Shoes tells the story of an eleven-year-old boy, Miguel, and his desire to experience adventure. Bored and frustrated by the work expected of him in his family's shop, he escapes to the attic, where he magically becomes a character in the book The Adventures of Tom Sawyer. Illustrations support the text.
meta: awe, bandanna, betray, booty, bow, devious, eerie, entranced, responsibilities, sandbar, shale, slats, stern
